event.title: was founded by United States citizens in 1833

data.event: The city was founded by United States citizens in 1833 on the west bank of the Maumee River, and originally incorporated as part of Monroe County, Michigan Territory.

event.title: 1837, after conclusion of the Toledo War, when it was incorporated

data.event: It was re-founded in 1837, after conclusion of the Toledo War, when it was incorporated in Ohio.
